long_description: Victorinox Hanging toiletry kit keeps all your toiletries safe and secure as you whisk about on your travels. It conveniently hangs for easy access once you're at your home-away-from-home. Large main compartment stores and organizes full-sized toiletries and features a mesh divider. 2 outer zip pockets store shower bottles, razor, toothbrush, toothpaste and other essentials. Convenient hanging hook displays kit from shower, door or towel bar. Constructed of abrasion-, moisture- and tear-resistant ballistic nylon for exceptional durability.
short_description: Victorinox Hanging toiletry kit keeps all your toiletries safe and secure as you whisk about on your travels. It conveniently hangs for easy access once you're at your home-away-from-home.
